text: Take the Money and Run is a 1969 American comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and also starring Janet Margolin, Marcel Hillaire, Lonny Chapman, Jan Merlin, James K Anderson, Mark Gordon, Mike O'Dowd. It was distributed by Cinerama Releasing Corporation. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1969 crime movies Category:1969 comedy movies Category:American crime movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:American independent movies Category:Heist movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: Take the Money and Run
